Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp , gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.
Generation IX.Violet: These Pokémon make their homes in piles of scrap metal. They test the strength of each other's hammers by smashing them together.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Six East Province: Area Two West Province: Area Two , Asado Desert North Province: Area One , Area Three , Dalizapa Passage , Casseroya Lake West Province: Area One ( Dark Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Six East Province: Area Two West Province: Area Two , Asado Desert North Province: Area One , Area Three , Dalizapa Passage , Casseroya Lake West Province: Area One ( Dark Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
